revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = AC1900 Wireless Smart Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Linksys_EA6900_v1.0 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = Supported |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Linksys |model = EA6900 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.0 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 09/06/2013‎ |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Linksys EA6900 v1.0 |wlclass = AC1900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-EA6900 |icid = 3839A-EA6900 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = 48SAB406.SGD |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4708A0; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 800 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G100TFI00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = 1600 |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G63DFR-PBC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;(vender modified); |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, internal,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, FreshTomato-ARM,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/12/2013 |estreldate = 10/04/2013 |estprice = 229.99 |upc = 745883598588 |ean = 4260184663163 |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00EXK14S0 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |nqam1 = 600 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "48SAB406.SGD" and "2013/07/01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
{{WiFiCert|WFA50238|09/06/2013}}
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32247-linksys-ea6900-wireless-ac-router-smart-wi-fi-dual-band-ac1900-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Specifications in this entry are per ''SmallNetBuilder''. :"48SAB406.0GA", "2013/08/19", and PCB manuf. text (date code :''1335'', Sep 2013) is silkscreened on the top of the board.
===Misc=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32206-linksys-announces-ac1900-router ''Linksys Announces AC1900 Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :This router joins the ranks of other AC1900 designation routers :(routers using QAM256 modulation on the 2.4GHz band, currently :marketed by ''Broadcom'' alone as ''nqam''). *[http://store.linksys.com/Routers/Linksys-EA6900-App-Enabled-AC1900-Dual-Band-Wireless-Router-with-Gigabit_stcVVproductId155849479VVcatId551966VVviewprod.htm On the '''Linksys''' store] :1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0, 3x antenna (RP-SMA connectors)
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== *[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=291230 Linksys EA 6900 Install Guide]
===Flashing Tomato=== {{ombox | type = speedy | style = width: 42%; | text = '''WARNING:''' <small>CFE 32KB NVRAM Bug.</small> }}
*[https://www.linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/guide-flash-linksys-ea6300v1-ea6400-ea6500v2-ea6700-ea6900v1-0-1-1-with-tomato.73877/ Please read the following thread before flashing]
==Upgrading== ===Upgrading Tomato from Tomato=== ???
==Reverting== ===Reverting Tomato back to stock firmware=== ???
==Notes== ===Possibly used PSUs=== *The power supplies shown in the FCC photos are the :''Ktec'' KSAS0451200350HU and a :''Leader Electronics'' MU42-1120350-A1.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Ktec |model = KSAS0451200350HU |input_v=100-240 |input_a=1.2 |input_hz=50/60 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=3.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical |e_level=5 }}
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Leader Electronics |model = MU42-1120350-A1 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=1.5 |input_hz=50/60 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=3.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical |e_level=5 }}
